comment: She does have a lot of assignments due at once, but they are not that bad. Overall, she is the worst professor I have ever had. Good luck trying to get a straight answer from her; it will not happen. Her syllabus and instructions do not line up at all. I never write these and I have had some terrible professors in my days, but she is next to none.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: My oh my. 7 week course, 3 papers of 5+ pages, and a 10+ page research paper. On top of this, 3 discussion posts and 12 quizzes. Think that is all? The syllabus is outdated, and assignment instructions are unclear :-).  If this Professor is the only option for a class...good luck. AVOID AT ALL COST.

Avoid at all costs. Dr Withers made no effort whatsoever to facilitate learning in this course. She simply evaluated our ability to teach ourselves the material. The only content she developed for the course was the

This was the worst professor I have ever had. This program is very strict on deadlines, which I understand in a graduate-level course, however, she failed to simply put our grades into the registrar by the deadline. For this reason, she was unable to post our grades, and were told we would have to wait until May to receive our final grades. AVOID!!

I never review professors, but she is horrible. Assigned 4 papers, 5-10 pages each, single-spaced, for a 7-week class. There's also a midterm and final, a bunch of discussions, 2 shorter papers, and 12 lockdown quizzes, all of which seem to be written to make you fail, even if you've done the reading and watched the videos. Avoid her at all costs!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--So many papers--Tough grader
